data.Description: Electricity Efficiency Energy, 2012
data.Scope: This output class is limited to:   - conducting electricity efficiency research, and   - development and administration of programmes that provide incentives for cost-effective energy efficiency and conservation, aimed at changing market behaviours.

data.Description: International Energy Agency Contribution Energy, 2012
data.Scope: Payment of contributions towards the cost of energy-related research undertaken by the International Energy Agency.

data.Description: Climate Change Research Primary Industries, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to obtaining science, research, technology, capacity and capability in climate change related to the primary land-based sectors.

data.Description: Primary Growth Partnership Primary Industries, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to primary, food and forestry sector investment in education and skills development, research and development, product development, commercialisation, market development and technology transfer, in partnership with relevant industry groups, including research related to greenhouse gases via the Centre for Agricultural Greenhouse Gas Research.

data.Description: Sustainable Farming Fund Primary Industries, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to community driven programmes aimed at improving economic and environmental performance.

data.Description: Advanced Technology Institute Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to capital expenditure to support the establishment and development of an advanced technology institute.

data.Description: Australian Synchrotron Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to a grant being New Zealand Government's contribution to the operation of a synchrotron located in Victoria, Australia.

data.Description: Biological Industries Research Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to support productivity growth and sustainability of New Zealand’s primary industries, and the development of premium food and industrial biological products and technologies responsive to global consumer preferences.

data.Description: Convention Du Metre Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to the payment of New Zealand's annual subscription to the Convention du Metre.

data.Description: Crown Research Institute Core Funding Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to Crown Research Institutes to create and maintain capability that is required for their core purpose and strategy.

data.Description: Energy and Minerals Research Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to improve mineral extraction, improve energy security and to obtain efficient and affordable energy use.

data.Description: Engaging New Zealanders with Science and Technology Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Appropriation: Engaging New Zealanders with Science and Technology
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to engaging New Zealanders with science and technology through approaches determined by the Minister.

data.Description: Environmental Research Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to underpin the management, protection and enhancement of natural ecosystems, land and freshwater resources, climate and atmosphere within New Zealand, including Antarctica.

data.Description: Fellowships for Excellence Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to encouraging the career development of the country’s talented early and mid-career researchers.

data.Description: Genomics Research Infrastructure Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to a grant to contribute towards the purchase and operation of infrastructure that will support genomics research.

data.Description: Hazards and Infrastructure Research Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to support hazard management and improve the durability of NZ urban and rural settlements.

data.Description: Health and Society Research Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to improve the health and social well-being of New Zealanders.

data.Description: High Value Manufacturing and Services Research Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Appropriation: High Value Manufacturing and Services Research
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to develop new technologies, novel materials, and new products, processes and services for the manufacturing and technology sectors.

data.Description: International Relationships Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to grants for international research relationships.

data.Description: Marsden Fund Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to excellent investigator-initiated research.

data.Description: National eScience Infrastructure Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to a grant to contribute to the operation of the National eScience Infrastructure, including high-performance computational infrastructure and associated eScience services, that will support New Zealand research.

data.Description: National Measurement Standards Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to providing specified standards to satisfy the needs for traceable physical measurement in New Zealand.

data.Description: National Science Challenges Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to research and research applications to find innovative solutions to fundamental issues New Zealand faces in its future development.

data.Description: Research Contract Management Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to selection of research, science and technology-related organisations and individuals for either the provision of research, science and technology outputs, or the award of grants; and negotiate, manage and monitor appropriate contracts with those organisations or individuals.

data.Description: Royal Society of New Zealand Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to an annual grant to the Royal Society of New Zealand to contribute towards the Society’s aims and functions under the Royal Society of New Zealand Act 1997 to promote and advance science and technology.

data.Description: Science Collections and Infrastructure Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to grants to contribute to the maintenance and retention of databases, collections and significant infrastructure dedicated to research purposes.

data.Description: Vision Mātauranga Capability Fund Science and Innovation, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to the development of skilled people and organisations undertaking research that supports the four themes of Vision Matauranga; indigenous innovation, environmental sustainability, health and social well being, and exploring indigenous knowledge.

data.Description: Centres of Research Excellence Tertiary Education, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to the purchase of cooperative and collaborative tertiary research in areas of research strength in the tertiary education sector through the contestable Centres of Research Excellence Fund.

data.Description: Performance-Based Research Fund Tertiary Education, 2012
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to funding research and research-based teaching on the basis of measured research quality in tertiary education organisations.

data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to operating the Crash Analysis System and performing associated crash analysis and research activities.

data.Description: Strategic Science Investment Fund: Strategic Science Investment Fund - Capital for Infrastructure Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Strategic Science Investment Fund: Strategic Science Investment Fund - Capital for Infrastructure
data.Scope: This category is limited to providing capital to entities owned or controlled by the Crown for the purchase and development of national-scale science infrastructure.

data.Description: Strategic Science Investment Fund: Strategic Science Investment Fund - Infrastructure Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Strategic Science Investment Fund: Strategic Science Investment Fund - Infrastructure
data.Scope: This category is limited to funding that provides access to research technology, facilities, infrastructure, collections and databases, and associated support services.

data.Description: Strategic Science Investment Fund: Strategic Science Investment Fund - Programmes Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Strategic Science Investment Fund: Strategic Science Investment Fund - Programmes
data.Scope: This category is limited to funding for research organisations to undertake longer-term programmes of mission-led research.

data.Description: Talent and Science Promotion: Fellowships for Excellence Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Talent and Science Promotion: Fellowships for Excellence
data.Scope: This category is limited to encouraging the career development of the country's talented early and mid-career researchers.

data.Description: Talent and Science Promotion: Royal Society of New Zealand Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Talent and Science Promotion: Royal Society of New Zealand
data.Scope: This category is limited to an annual grant to the Royal Society of New Zealand to contribute towards the Society's aims and functions under the Royal Society of New Zealand Act 1997 to promote and advance science and technology.

data.Description: Talent and Science Promotion: Science in Society Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Talent and Science Promotion: Science in Society
data.Scope: This category is limited to approaches that enhance and enable better engagement of New Zealanders with science and technology.

data.Description: Talent and Science Promotion: Vision Mātauranga Capability Fund Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Talent and Science Promotion: Vision Mātauranga Capability Fund
data.Scope: This category is limited to the development of skilled people and organisations undertaking research that supports the four themes of Vision Matauranga; indigenous innovation, environmental sustainability, health and social well- being, and exploring indigenous knowledge.

data.Description: Targeted Business Research and Development Funding Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Targeted Business Research and Development Funding
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to co-funding for private businesses to undertake research and development projects and for funding students to work in research and development active businesses.

data.Description: Transitional Support to Research and Development Performing Businesses Business, Science and Innovation, 2021
data.Appropriation: Transitional Support to Research and Development Performing Businesses
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to providing a temporary transitional support payment to former recipients of the Research and Development Growth Grant to support them to transition to the Research & Development Tax Incentive.

data.Description: R&D Tax Incentive Revenue, 2021
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to providing an R&D tax credit to eligible R&D performing businesses.

data.Description: Centres of Research Excellence Tertiary Education, 2021
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to the purchase of cooperative and collaborative tertiary research in areas of research strength in the tertiary education sector through the contestable Centres of Research Excellence Fund.

data.Description: Tertiary Education Research and Research-Based Teaching Tertiary Education, 2021
data.Appropriation: Tertiary Education Research and Research-Based Teaching
data.Scope: This appropriation is limited to funding research and research-based teaching on the basis of measured research quality in tertiary education organisations and supporting Wananga research capability.
